product_name: Red Ledge Heavy Duty Reversible Poncho
long_description: The waterproof Red Ledge Heavy Duty Reversible poncho keeps you dry on rainy days in town and on the trail. Includes a hood with adjustable drawcords so you can keep out the wind and rain. Waterproof PVC construction. Side snaps keep poncho sides from flapping in the wind. Reversible design lets you choose between subtle gray on 1 side and high-visibility yellow on the other. Includes grommets in the corners so you can turn the poncho into an emergency shelter. 1 size fits all; Red Ledge Heavy Duty Reversible poncho has a back length of 47 in.
